name: Superhero Rescue City
description:
You as monster hero fight against these mutant villains in this final battle. It is the time to protect your city against these super villains. The city has been attacked by monster. Battle is going on against the monster using hero futuristic powers skills.

Game Features:
- Addictive Game Play.
- Action filled missions.
- Smooth control and user friendly.
- Be the super incredible monster hero and avenger.
